description: Schema for YAML front-matter used in Uptime Watcher Markdown guides (e.g. docs/Guides/*.md). NOTE: This schema intentionally avoids TypeDoc-reserved keys (title/category/group) because TypeDoc's external-documents frontmatter handling can change output routing when those keys are present.

$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema reference used by editors to validate front matter.

audience.description: Optional intended audience labels (e.g. frontend, backend, ai-assistant).

author.description: Primary author or maintainer of the document.

created.description: Date the document was originally created (YYYY-MM-DD), usually from git log.

doc_category.description: Coarse document type; currently always 'guide' for docs/Guides/*.md. Named 'doc_category' to avoid TypeDoc frontmatter routing side-effects.

doc_group.description: Optional grouping label for internal tooling. Named 'doc_group' to avoid TypeDoc frontmatter routing side-effects.

doc_title.description: Human-friendly document title (usually matches the H1). Named 'doc_title' to avoid TypeDoc frontmatter routing side-effects.

last_reviewed.description: Date the content was last reviewed/updated (YYYY-MM-DD).

schema.description: Optional JSON Schema reference used by editors to validate front matter.

status.description: Optional lifecycle state of the document.

summary.description: One-line description used for indexes and search.

tags.description: Small set of focused keywords describing technologies or domains.

title: Uptime Watcher Documentation Front Matter
